text: Dry Summer (also known as Reflections; ) is a 1964 Turkish drama movie directed by Metin Erksan and starring Erol Taş, Hülya Koçyiğit, Zeki Tüney, Hakki Haktan, Ercan Yazgan. ==Other websites== * Category:1964 drama movies Category:Turkish movies Category:Movies directed by Metin Erksan Category:Movies about farmers Category:Movies set in Turkey
title: Dry Summer
